member.name: D3D12_SAMPLE_POSITION
member.summary: Describes a sub-pixel sample position for use with programmable sample positions.

member.name: D3D12_SAMPLE_POSITION.X
member.summary: A signed sub-pixel coordinate value in the X axis.

member.name: D3D12_SAMPLE_POSITION.Y
member.summary: A signed sub-pixel coordinate value in the Y axis.
